title: Tarot
html_content:
“ I have drawn a card for all of you; today, your card is Audience. I do believe you all will be in for quite the show of a lifetime. ”
Chris, after drawing the Abundance card.[1]

The tarot is a pack of playing cards that have been used for divination since the late 18th century. Chris owns a colorfully illustrated set known as the Osho Zen Tarot. Unlike a standard 78-card tarot deck, this one has a 79th card depicting Osho, the leader of the Rajneesh cult who endorsed this set and whose followers were responsible for a bioterror attack and assassination attempt on a United States Attorney in the mid 1980s.

Chris apparently began a hobby of daily tarot readings on June 3, 2021. He would draw a random card from the deck and interpret its meaning to his Twitter followers (referring to them as the Collective), and would also draw a card for himself. Sometimes he would draw two or three cards. He drew a Schizophrenia card for the collective two days in a row on June 23 and 24, and again on July 3, which may be an ominous sign for the rest of us.

In mid July, the tarot cards provided some comfort for Chris as he mourned the death of Snoopy, drawing the Maturity card for the Collective and the Healing card for himself on July 16. Twitter users accused him of misusing cards and selecting them himself rather than drawing them randomly.[2]

The final card for the next several years would be drawn on July 30, Turning In. Chris would be arrested the next day, beginning the Jail Saga. It is unknown whether Chris has attempted any card-based divination while he was incarcerated, though he was known to play solitaire on a Personally Blessed Turkish prayer rug.[3]

The tarot cards returned in August 2024, when Chris tweeted about drawing Trust.[4] Chris then got a new Tarot deck around the end of August.[5]

List of Cards Chris Drew

Chris' Tarot Cards
Card Name Chris/Coll. Date Drawn Chris's Interpretation
Aloneness Collective 16 June 2021/26 June 2021 You each have an inner light that brightens and shows your path to the next steps. Caution./ Let that which is toxic with you, as an individual, go.
Audience (Abundance) Collective 4 June 2021 I do believe you all will be in for quite the show of a lifetime.
Burden (The) Collective 5 June 2021 Acknowlage that which weighs you down; lighten your burden.
Comparison Collective 27 June 2021 You are not ultimatley to compare yourself with others, but to compare ourselves to ourselves.
Control Collective 10 June 2021 Some to a bunch of you have been taking control of your life (for better or good). Now is time to step back an take it easy.
Courage Collective 19 June 2021 There is pain and struggle within the self-transformations amoungst you all.
Creator (The) Collective 30 June 2021 You have found yourself and have achived a sense of spiritual maturity. Express yourself with this within you.
Dream (The)[note 1] Chris 5 June 2021 No interpretation given.
Friendliness Collective 22 June 2021 You are becoming less focused on the drama of others & more focused on being kind and more accepting.
Going With The Flow Unspecified 12 June 2021 Go with the flow. On one perspective, everything is working out around all of us.
Guidance Collective 11 June 2021 You have been charged and considerably reborn after the solar eclipse, and the void of time between it and the lunar eclipse. Your inner voice is stroger today; listen to it.
Innocence Collective 6 June 2021 Enjoy the simplicities of innocence; be like child like as you may, and count your blessings.
Integration Chris/Collective 3 June 2021 Interpritation is left up to you.
Justice (upside-down) Collective 27 August 2024 Something sketchy is going on. Intuition tells me the sketchy one is Trump and his recent admissions. Regardless, for everyone of you all, it is best to remain diligent in doing good by yourself and everyone around you.
Letting Go Collective 28 June 2021 Letting go of any remaining toxic individuals and habits, or those you have lost recently & long ago.
Mind Collective 15 June 2021 Check your mind/body connections, and don´t overthink yourself towards a head trip.
Past Lives Collective 29 June 2021 Find your deepest intelligence in your past lives, between two metaphorical rainbow lizards of knowing and unknowing.
Possibilities Collective 25 June 2021 There are many choices and paths to choose from.
Postponement Collective 18 June 2021 Some to all amoungst you all who have remaining thoughts and ideas that are preventing your respective desired outcomes from happening sooner.
Projections Collective/Chris 17 June 2021 Recognizing what is true and separating the illusions from it. ( This specifically applies to the iron curtain.)
Schizophrenia Collective/Collective 23 June 2021/24 June 2021 Follow your heart and instincts; when conflicted by 2 options, pick the 3rd./ Conflicting issues to be heart and instinct-guided away from.
Sharing Collective 9 June 2021 Share positive energy & kindness with everyone. A moment of genuine kindness goes far.
Sorrow Collective 7 June 2021 You may be in deep thoughts or feeling such an emotion. This is a time for potential transformation for yourself.
Sorrow Collective 21 June 2021 Major self-transformation soon.
Success Collective 8 June 2021 Finding realizations and unique insights within yourself. Your tasks continue onward in enlightenment.
Trust Collective 17 August 2024 Keep Faith in that the Brightest Light Powered and Good individuals and our media shall triumph and make things better for the majority who are at least Neutral to Good and open improvements for the neutral bad to become neutral-good.
Turning In Collective/Collective 14 June 2021/30 July 2021 Today is the day to meditate for a while and being in the moments./You are encouraged to withdraw from any and all dramas.
